quote: Nothing that results in human progress is achieved with unanimous consent. – Christopher Columbus
fact: It has NEVER rained in Calama, a town in the Atacama Desert of Chile.
joke: If you’re struggling to think of what to get someone for Christmas. Get them a fridge and watch their face light up when they open it.
